title: Did Nancy Pelosi Say Building a Wall Will Violate the Rights of ‘Millions of Illegals’?
subtitle: A quote from the House Minority Leader about how building a wall on the Mexican border would violate the rights of undocumented people is a hoax.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: Nancy Pelosi said that building a wall will violate the rights of "millions of 'illegals.'"
